subject: Public Speaking
title: Cultural Values and Receptivity
description: A quick win: understand Cultural Values and Receptivity.

hook.text: Conservative audiences resist change. Progressive ones resist tradition.

buildup.text: Cultural values filter what audiences accept or reject.

discovery.text: The same message can succeed or fail depending on framing.

twist.text: Know your audience's values BEFORE crafting your message.

climax.text: Adapting to cultural values isn't manipulation. It's respect.

quiz.question: Why do cultural values matter?
options: They filter what audiences accept or reject
